page.title: 04DR.BURGESS.DR.SHARP
page.content:
{ DR.BURGESS}enjoys being a doctor because he enjoys meeting people.He has a busy surgery in Distington which has 3 doctors,4 nurses,a cleaner and 6 part time receptionists.Every morning they have a staff meeting with the nurses.He has several special interests in medicine,particulary children and old people.He is also interested in acupuncture.
{DR.SHARP'S}special interests is in tropical diseases eg.Malaria,and he goes abroad for his holidays to study them.He also told us about the strangest experience of his career; when he had been a doctor in Africa a women had a baby in the back of his car.Before the Africas would go in it again,the Whitch Doctor had to come and clear the car of spirits.
